name: Curve DAO Token
description: Similar to Uniswap, Curve Finance is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) based Decentralised Exchange (DEX). Unlike Uniswap, its main focus is only to swap between assets that are supposed to have the same value. Locked CRV tokens are used for protocol governance and also receive half of Curve's trading fees.

en.description: Similar to Uniswap, Curve Finance is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) based Decentralised Exchange (DEX). Unlike Uniswap, its main focus is only to swap between assets that are supposed to have the same value. Locked CRV tokens are used for protocol governance and also receive half of Curve's trading fees.

fr.description: Similar to Uniswap, Curve Finance is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) based Decentralised Exchange (DEX). Unlike Uniswap, its main focus is only to swap between assets that are supposed to have the same value. Locked CRV tokens are used for protocol governance and also receive half of Curve's trading fees.

es.description: Similar a Uniswap, Curve Finance es un Exchange Descentralizado (DEX) basado en un Creador de Mercado Automatizado (AMM). A diferencia de Uniswap, su enfoque principal es solo intercambiar entre activos que se supone que tienen el mismo valor. Los tokens CRV bloqueados se utilizan para la gobernanza del protocolo y también reciben la mitad de las tarifas comerciales de Curve.

de.description: Similar to Uniswap, Curve Finance is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) based Decentralised Exchange (DEX). Unlike Uniswap, its main focus is only to swap between assets that are supposed to have the same value. Locked CRV tokens are used for protocol governance and also receive half of Curve's trading fees.

Unlike Uniswap, its main focus is only to swap between assets that are supposed to have the same value. tr.description: Uniswap'a benzer şekilde Curve Finance, Otomatik Piyasa Yapıcısı (AMM) tabanlı Merkezi Olmayan Borsa'dır (DEX). Uniswap'tan farklı olarak, ana odak noktası yalnızca aynı değere sahip olduğu varsayılan varlıklar arasında takas yapmaktır. Kilitli CRV jetonları, protokol yönetimi için kullanılır ve ayrıca Curve'ün alım satım ücretlerinin yarısını alır.

vi.description: Similar to Uniswap, Curve Finance is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) based Decentralised Exchange (DEX). Unlike Uniswap, its main focus is only to swap between assets that are supposed to have the same value. Locked CRV tokens are used for protocol governance and also receive half of Curve's trading fees.

zh.description: 与 Uniswap 一样，Curve 也是自动化做市的去中心化交易所（DEX）。但与 Uniswap 不同的是，Curve 专注在同价值代币之间的兑换。锁仓的 CRV 用于协议治理，同时可以获得一半交易手续费的分红。

hi.description: Uniswap के समान, Curve Finance एक स्वचालित मार्केट मेकर (AMM) आधारित विकेंद्रीकृत एक्सचेंज (DEX) है। Uniswap के विपरीत, इसका मुख्य फोकस केवल उन संपत्तियों के बीच अदला-बदली करना है जिनका मूल्य समान होना चाहिए। लॉक किए गए CRV टोकन का उपयोग प्रोटोकॉल गवर्नेंस के लिए किया जाता है और Curve की ट्रेडिंग फीस का आधा हिस्सा भी प्राप्त होता है।
